title: Extract Ralph prompt to shared file
description: Move the Ralph system prompt to prompts/ralph-prompt.md so both bash and Bun versions use the same prompt. Include AGENTS.md auto-update instructions and CR integration.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create prompts/ralph-prompt.md with full Ralph instructions
Include AGENTS.md auto-update section in prompt
Include CodeRabbit integration: run cr review, create BUG-xxx if issues
Update ralph-simple.zsh to read prompt from file
Test: Ralph uses shared prompt correctly
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
